attributes.action: Aid Iran to overcome harsh sanctions by USA
attributes.additional_details: Thousands of cancer patients are lined up awaiting their early death due to medicine imports being blocked by US sanctions- healthcare is human right and should not be decided by the ignorance of the elite. Act now and stop unnecessary  suffering.
attributes.background: Iran has been a victim US sanctions for successive years now and has only been torturing the people not the government. It is time to put economic politics aside and stop this heartbreaking suffering of the innocent millions who have no part in the government policies.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to aid Iran. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
